home.title: Welcome to GreenNext
home.description: GreenNext is a smart, modular platform built to secure and optimize your campus. Automate attendance, control access, monitor weather, and save energy through IoT-driven features.

features.title: Smart&Secure Campus Features
features.description: Digitize your campus with reliable, connected tools tailored for all educational environments.
features.accessControlDesc: Use RFID systems and servomotors to secure entrances with timestamped logs.
features.attendanceDesc: Record student attendance via Wi-Fi or RFID cards.
features.energyDesc: Reduce waste with PIR and LDR sensors in classrooms.
features.weatherDesc: Measure temperature, humidity, and rainfall with DHT and rain sensors.
features.dashboardDesc: Manage all devices from a single, intuitive interface.
features.modesDesc: Operate autonomously with SD card or sync to the cloud via ESP8266.

highlights.iotModulesDescription: Leverage modular Arduino systems — from smart doors and energy-saving lights to RFID attendance and weather reports.
highlights.educationReadyDescription: GRENEXT is built for schools, universities, and learning centers — bilingual, scalable, and energy-efficient.
highlights.testimonial: With GRENEXT, our institute has automated daily routines, reduced electricity costs, and gained full visibility into student flow — all from a single dashboard.
highlights.platformDescription: Centralize access logs, energy reports, weather data, and attendance metrics on one intuitive platform.
